Text:
Here is a link to the three-volume text book. It contains the written music that you'll use for the class as well as many practice exercises.
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3537772

Here is the CD for Volume 2 in the series.
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3918541
Thanks for uploading!!! Please keep seeding =D

No, there are no tabs. This video will teach you how to actually read music as well as play it, so that you'll never have to rely on tabs again. (Not that tabs are a bad thing -- they certainly have their place and are very convenient when trying to learn a piece for which standard notation is unavailable.)

Thanks for doing this, mate.  I can't wait to get started.  Beats fighting traffic on Mass Ave. to actually attend the god damn school in person.
